comments.comments_text: What a beautiful moment! Harry Kane (Bayern Munich) got to the ball and unleashed a strong shot from distance. It turned out to be a good decision as his effort found its way into the top of the net. Marcel Schuhen just shakes his head in disbelief. The score changes to 5:0.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Thomas Muller (Bayern Munich) beautifully controls a strongly hit pass from Noussair Mazraoui inside the box. He cuts inside his marker and rifles the ball into the middle of the goal. 6:0.
